title: How to Double Crochet a Child's Poncho

steps.headline: Measurements to fit chest sizes:
steps.description: 21-21" - size 2-4 25-26 1/2" - size 6-8 28-30" - size 10-12 Note: Instructions for sizes 6-8 and 10-12 will be in parentheses.

steps.headline: Make two pieces alike.
steps.description: Using a size K hook, Ch 74 (84-94).

steps.headline: Row 1: DC in 4th ch from hook, ch 1.
steps.description: Sk next st, *dc in next st, ch 1, sk next st. Rep from * across, ending with dc. Ch 4 (counts as dc and ch 1, now and throughout), and turn.

steps.headline: Row 2: *DC in ch 1 sp, and ch 1.
steps.description: Rep from * across, ending with dc. Ch 4 and turn.

steps.headline: Rows 3-10(11-12): Rep row 2.
steps.description: Except on last row, do not ch 4 and turn. Ch 2 and turn.

steps.headline: Row 11(12-13): * SC in ch 1 sp and ch 1.
steps.description: Rep from * across, ending with sc. Fasten off.

steps.headline: Stitch pieces together as shown in the diagram.
steps.description:

Measurements to fit chest sizes: 21-21" - size 2-4 25-26 1/2" - size 6-8 28-30" - size 10-12 Note: Instructions for sizes 6-8 and 10-12 will be in parentheses. Make two pieces alike. Using a size K hook, Ch 74 (84-94). Row 1: DC in 4th ch from hook, ch 1. Sk next st, *dc in next st, ch 1, sk next st. Rep from * across, ending with dc. Ch 4 (counts as dc and ch 1, now and throughout), and turn. Row 2: *DC in ch 1 sp, and ch 1. Rep from * across, ending with dc. Ch 4 and turn. Rows 3-10(11-12): Rep row 2. Except on last row, do not ch 4 and turn. Ch 2 and turn. Row 11(12-13): * SC in ch 1 sp and ch 1. Rep from * across, ending with sc. Fasten off. Stitch pieces together as shown in the diagram. When stitching these two pieces together, keep the sc row at the top. After weaving chain, gather the hat around the chain and tie in a bow. Add fringe. (optional)
